entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.7°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Thursday: Cloudy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning late this evening. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
